channel.title: Work on Aaron King
channel.description: Recent content in Work on Aaron King

item.title: AO Archive: How to Prototype Quickly
item.description: https://spin.atomicobject.com/2020/03/24/light-speed-programming/ This is a blog post I wrote while working at Atomic Object. It provides some advice for prototyping applications in an unusually short timespan.

item.title: AO Archive: The Culture Cycle
item.description: https://spin.atomicobject.com/2018/03/18/culture-cycle-at-work/ https://spin.atomicobject.com/2018/05/06/culture-cycle-examples/ This is a two-part blog post I wrote while working at Atomic Object. It’s about applying the Culture Cycle to businesses and organizations.
